name: Claw-n-Win!
description:
Claw-n-win! is a game that was created as a part of TOJAM 2022!

In the game you are playing as Penny, a cat who is chilling inside a claw machine and stopping people from claiming prizes! And Penny is special! She can also move towards and from the screen as well!

Use WASD to move, L to jump and K to swat! Don't let the claws get away with the prizes! Stand until the timer for the room is out, then you can move on to the next level!

Each level comes with more prizes and more claws! This is total claw mayhem!

Credits:

Programmers: M.S.T.O.P. & TLBunny

Artists: Angel, Catboy Miller, Jollybard
